alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 22 at 5:00PM MST until December 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...The Rapid City area, the Custer County Plains and the Fall River County Plains. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Rapid City
